Config Files

Config Files#

Sample Parameters

[Paths]
CARLA_PYTHON_PATH = E2E_Pseudo-Lidar\carla_data\carla\WindowsNoEditor\PythonAPI\carla
# Type : str
# Description : Path to local CARLA application via the PythonAPI.

DATA_PATH = E2E_Pseudo-Lidar\carla_data\data
# Type : str 
# Description : Path to data; this is the default root directory.


[Internal Variables]
EGO_BEHAVIOR = normal
# Type : str
# Description : Internal driver style.


[External Variables]
EXTERNAL_BEHAVIOR = normal
# Type : str
# Description : External driver style.

WEATHER = 1
# Type : int
# Description : Time/Weather preset; i.e. 1 = ClearNoon.

MAP = Town01
# Type : str
# Description : CARLA town map.

Model Parameters

Data Collection Parameters

[Data Collection]
POLL_RATE = 3
# Type : int
# Description :  Rate of frame collection (per second).

CAMERA_X = 1920
# Type : int
# Description : Resolution of frame along x axis.

CAMERA_Y = 1080
# Type : int
# Description : Resolution of frame along y axis.

CAMERA_FOV = 90
# Type : int
# Description : Field of view of the camera (degrees).
